title: Journey AI Send Time Optimization
description: Journey AI Send Time Optimization scores provide the time preferences for message deliveries. Higher score means a better outcome (for example email got clicked) is expected, if a message sent at the corresponding hour.

xdm:emailChannel.title: emailChannel
xdm:emailChannel.description: Send Time Optimization scores for email channel

xdm:sendTimeScoreForClick.title: sendTimeScoreForClick
xdm:sendTimeScoreForClick.description: scores for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer clicking on an email's link if it's sent at that hour

xdm:sendTimeScoreForOpen.title: sendTimeScoreForOpen
xdm:sendTimeScoreForOpen.description: scores for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer opening an email if it's sent at that hour

xdm:pushChannel.title: pushChannel
xdm:pushChannel.description: Send Time Optimization scores for push channel

xdm:sendTimeScoreForOpen.title: sendTimeScoreForOpen
xdm:sendTimeScoreForOpen.description: score for 7*24 hours from GMT Monday hour 0 to Sunday hour 23, representing the inclination of the customer opening a push notification if it's sent at that hour

xdm:scoreInfo.title: scoreInfo
xdm:scoreInfo.description: model version and score date as a concatenated string
